CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TEXT( Buyer_Type__c ) = 'Restaurant', GMaps_Rating__c >= 4, NOT(ISBLANK( Social_Instagram__c )) ), IF( Text(Parent_Account__r.Scope__c) = "Local", "Focus Target User", "Target User" ), "Non-Target User" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Target Users are Users meeting the following criteria : "Primary Type" = Restaurant, "Google Maps Rating" >= 4,00 and have Instagram.
CustomField.label: Target User Evalulation
